title: Digitalarkivet
description: Website for the Norwegian National Archives. I contributed to building the digital asset management system from scratch—used for viewing and editing photos, documents, and their metadata.

title: Ponder
description: An application for automatic assessment and feedback in higher education, developed during my time at Disputas. We began the project before the rise of LLMs and pivoted from a graph-based approach to using language models for assessment and feedback.

title: Smart TV applications
description: During a brief period at Norigin Media, I worked on Smart TV applications for various clients. The apps were developed using React Native and TypeScript.

title: Kabal
description: A card game, also known as Solitaire. A fun yet challenging project featuring advanced state management—each card maintains its own state, enabling movement with minimal knowledge of other cards.

title: Mock TV program guide
description: A mock Electronic Program Guide (EPG) that lets you find the “current” shows. Built as part of a job application process.

title: Norwegian skiing
description: A video portfolio site created for a video project for a family member. Deploys as a JAM stack, using Gatsby frontend, and Contentful as a headless CMS in the backend. This enables content editing by the site owner. The version shown here uses mock data.

title: CV Maker
description: A project developed during the first couple of months I was at Skyetec. Intended as an internal tool at the company, it also served as a training project.

title: MyPrivateChef
description: MyPrivateChef is a fictional booking service for people looking to hire a private chef, for example for events. The site was created as the final project at the Salt bootcamp.

title: Snake
description: A classic game that’s just as fun to build as it is to play. It works on both mobile and desktop.
